dialog.text: Divide the image into two halves. The second-half of the image is grass. There are trees that appear in the left half and thin out as they move across the image.
How tall/dense are the trees at the far left? Is there anything else in the grass on the bottom half?

For the trees, it's dense from the left to about 1/4(of the image) away from the right edge The trees go into the bottom half of the image on the left, and increase until they're just at the half-mark on the right side. The remaining 1/4 is just a small line of trees.
So the trees go across the whole horizon line? How steeply does the height decrease from left to right?
the line doesn't increase too steep. so the bottom of the tree starts below the left edge half mark. and the Bottom line of the trees stop at the halfway mark of the right edge.
How about the slope of the treetops? And what is the weather/atmosphere of the image like (sunny or cloudy, night or day)?

atmosphere is sunny. For top of the trees at the right edge, start a little above the halfway mark and draw a wavy line increasing at the same slope(slightly more curved) until you are 1/4 away from the right edge. Draw a line down till the halfway line.
Could you tell me more about the trees at the left side of the image? How tall are they?
If you partitioned the image into 4 parts horizontally, then the trees are about the size of 1/4th image.
Okay, is there anything in the sky?
There are clouds on the right edge above the trees. It creates a mountain like shape but doesn't go too high. There are clouds on the left edge above the trees.
How thin are the clouds on the left?

They are half the width of the trees on the the left edge. Also, for the trees, it's an upward slope from the left to the right. So the grass has an almost curve downward, and the trees just follow it.
Got it. Is there anything other than trees, grass, clouds, and sky? If not, I think the drawing is done
The curve for the grass should be steeper and make a bigger curve, so it's like the trees are growing diagonally. there's also one tree growing slightly below the left edge of trees on the bottom.
Got that, is there anything else?
The clouds on the left edge should be a bit smaller and go less to the right. Other than that, it's good.
Done!
Ok, then finish game?
yep
